main event: An observation of luminous discs moving in chains over Vineyard Haven, Massachusetts, before dawn, in Fall 1949.
interesting points: The sighting coincided with the arrival of a squadron of jet planes at Otis Air Base., The discs were chains that appeared to overlap like fish scales., The observer initially thought the phenomenon might be related to jet planes, but flying conditions were poor due to a storm., The chains were described as moving swiftly in concentric patterns, with no apparent risk of collision., The display lasted from five to ten minutes before diminishing as daybreak approached.
sighted object: chains of luminous discs in the sky
witness description: The primary witness and his wife who were both present during the sighting
